name: PRASAR
briefDescription: PRASAR is the outcome of a decade of isolated individual endeavours, fighting adverse government’s and social conditions for bringing about a change with its multi sectoral programmatic activities-Education,Health,Nutrition and Livelihood in districts Barabanki and Pratapgarh.PRASAR has been working selflessly with dedication and commitment to improve the lives of the marginalized group since 1998.The initial activities included information dissemination on local self – governance, mobilizing community for active participation in local level development and primary education especially of the girl child and marginalized sections of the community. It was in 2003 that PRASAR formally came into existence with the above thematic areas in focus.
